about_the_game:
SUMMARY

The story begins in a quiet little village. Wind and parents had a peaceful life here. But in order to prevent the devil from resurrection, Wind resolutely sets foot on the road to destroy the magic crystal. Along the way he made friends and went on adventures. Finally he destroyed the magic crystal and harvest an accident...

FEATURES

  • Q version of the characters and lovely nostalgic painting style scenes. Let you feel like being in a fairy tale world.
  • The light-hearted plot and humorous dialogue keep you fully engaged. It allows you to move to another world and relax.
  • Full and complete. The seven scenes include villages, fields, towns, caves, islands, castles, and forests. Let you experience the fun of riding on these adventures. In addition, you can experience the fun of catching fish.
  • Set hidden items,.Remember to visit every room.You'll find amazing things.
  • Traditional turn-based RPG. Horizontal versus;
  • Operating support mouse, keyboard and handle.
detailed_description:
SUMMARY

The story begins in a quiet little village. Wind and parents had a peaceful life here. But in order to prevent the devil from resurrection, Wind resolutely sets foot on the road to destroy the magic crystal. Along the way he made friends and went on adventures. Finally he destroyed the magic crystal and harvest an accident...

FEATURES

  • Q version of the characters and lovely nostalgic painting style scenes. Let you feel like being in a fairy tale world.
  • The light-hearted plot and humorous dialogue keep you fully engaged. It allows you to move to another world and relax.
  • Full and complete. The seven scenes include villages, fields, towns, caves, islands, castles, and forests. Let you experience the fun of riding on these adventures. In addition, you can experience the fun of catching fish.
  • Set hidden items,.Remember to visit every room.You'll find amazing things.
  • Traditional turn-based RPG. Horizontal versus;
  • Operating support mouse, keyboard and handle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 supported card / 1280 x 720 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any non-integrated card with DirectX 9.0 support / 1280 x 720 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Guardian legend is a q RPG game. Lovely modeling, nostalgic style of the scene, humorous dialogue, can take you into a relaxed and happy fairy tale world. If you like this style, don't miss it.
